description: A successful executive in the cosmetic industry has three sexy girlfriends in three different states. When they decide to visit him in L.A., he's in big trouble.
keywords: virgo the astrological sign,blonde woman,brunette woman,new york city woman,miami florida
name: Chasing Papi

review.name: Very funny movie
review.reviewBody: First let me say - I don't speak/read/understand/relate to Spanish. When I say the movie my wife won from a radio station I rolled my eyes. I thought "great a movie I can really relate to". The Title is something to do with a Spanish version of "Who's your daddy" Ladies man. This guy was smooth with three lovely ladies who are falling overboard with his charm and understanding. Now lets get on with my comments: I LOVED it and yes once it is available on DVD, I will pick it up as something to laugh it. It was very original and tasteful. The Main Actors each had great roles and plenty of famous actors on the sides. For the Spanish Community it will be a highly recommended movie. For the Non-Spanish community it will be a something I will watch in the movie theater because once it leaves, it will be hard to remember it once it is available on rental (It won't stick out).
